verses.roman:
rātri haile svarūpa-rāmānande lañā
āpana manera bhāva kahe ughāḍiyā

synonyms: rātri haile—when there was night; svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; rāmānande—Rāmānanda Rāya; lañā—taking together; āpana manera—of His own mind; bhāva—the ecstatic feelings; kahe—speaks; ughāḍiyā—revealing.
translation: At night, Lord Caitanya would reveal to Svarūpa Dāmodara and Rāmānanda Rāya the ecstatic feelings of His mind.
